GpioConfiguration
Types
Feature

GPIO Feature options UNUSED_FEATURE  - 0x00 - Pin is unused GPIO_FEATURE  - 0x01 - Encoder is disabled PPS_FEATURE  - 0x02 - Single pulse input; one direction only ENCODER_FEATURE  - 0x03 - Quadrature encoder mode

GpioBehavior

GPIO Pin behavior UNUSED_BEHAVIOR  - 0x00 - Unused GPIO_INPUT_BEHAVIOR  - 0x01 - Input GPIO_OUTPUT_LOW_BEHAVIOR  - 0x02 - Output on low GPIO_OUTPUT_HIGH_BEHAVIOR  - 0x03 - Output on high

PpsBehavior

PPS Pin behavior UNUSED  - 0x00 - Pin is unused PPS_INPUT  - 0x01 - Input PPS_OUTPUT  - 0x02 - Single pulse input; one direction only

EncoderBehavior

Encoder Pin behavior UNUSED  - 0x00 - Pin is unused ENCODER_A  - 0x01 - Encoder is disabled ENCODER_B  - 0x02 - Single pulse input; one direction only

PinModes

PinModes for the pinMode Bitfield OPEN_DRAIN  - 0x01 PULLDOWN  - 0x02 PULLUP  - 0x04

Functions
pinModeValue
void pinModeValue(
uint8 val
)

Gets or sets the underlying value for the pin mode bitfield

Types
PinModes

A vector of GpioConfiguration::PinModes representing masked pin modes

BehaviorModes

A map of uint behavior ID, <GpioPinModeOptions> pairs

FeatureBehaviors

A map of GpioConfiguration::Feature, <GpioBehaviorModes> pairs

GpioPinOptions

A map of uint GPIO pin ID, <GpioFeatureBehaviors> pairs
